FuncDef:
The sr-te-policy backup hot-standby enable command enables HSB for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
The undo sr-te-policy backup hot-standby enable command disables HSB for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
By default, HSB is disabled for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
SR-MPLS TE Policies are used to direct traffic to traverse an SR-MPLS TE network. To improve SR-MPLS TE Policy reliability, run the sr-te-policy backup hot-standby enable command to enable HSB for all SR-MPLS TE Policies.
